Mobile-First Transition

Agency transitioned to a mobile-first development and design process. This dated site got a reboost from the new system.

Mobile-First Transition

Agency transitioned to a mobile-first development and design process. This dated site got a reboost from the new system.

Client
iMarket Solutions

Timeframe
1 week

Role
Design

Impact
20% Organic Conversion Rate

Problem

Dated lead generation site wasn't bringing in leads. The logo itself was the extent of brand identity.

[image of old site]

Solution

  • Introduced new pieces of branding that aligned with the logo:
    • Bright angles
    • topographic map
    • Custom icons
  • Chose imagery which spoke to their area of Minnesota
  • Designed mobile and desktop mockups of multiple pages

Link

Thanks for being here.

“And for you just being you” - FR
